title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid details and the session persists in localStorage

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Input valid username, email, and password
Submit the registration form
Check that the registration is successful and user is redirected to dashboard
Check that user authentication data is saved in localStorage

title: User Login Success
description: Verify user can login with valid credentials and the session persists

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid registered username/email and password
Click login button
Verify login is successful and user is redirected to dashboard
Verify session data is stored in localStorage

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login fails with invalid username/email or password

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid username/email or password
Click login button
Verify appropriate error message is displayed
Verify user remains on login page

title: Protected Routes Access Control
description: Verify that users cannot access protected routes without authentication

steps.description: Attempt to access '/dashboard' route without login
Verify redirection to login page
Attempt to access '/courses' route without login
Verify redirection to login page
Attempt to access '/assessment' route without login
Verify redirection to login page

title: User Logout Functionality
description: Verify that the user can logout successfully and session data is cleared

steps.description: Login with valid credentials
Click on logout button
Verify user is redirected to login page
Verify session data is removed from localStorage

title: Assessment Questions Count Per Domain
description: Verify that each skill assessment domain contains exactly 15 questions

steps.description: Navigate to assessment page after login
Select 'Frontend Development' domain
Verify that 15 questions are displayed for Frontend Development domain
Repeat selection and verification for 'Backend Development', 'Cloud Computing', 'Databases', and 'Security' domains
Verify each domain presents exactly 15 questions

title: Complete Skill Assessment Flow
description: Verify full assessment flow from domain selection, answering all questions, to result display

steps.description: Navigate to the assessment page after login
Select a skill domain (e.g., Frontend Development)
Answer all 15 questions sequentially
Submit the assessment
Verify the results page displays score percentage and correct skill classification

title: Dashboard Displays User Progress and Recommendations
description: Verify dashboard reflects assessment progress and personalized course recommendations

steps.description: Login and navigate to the dashboard
Verify user assessment progress status is displayed correctly
Verify course recommendations are shown based on assessment results

title: Course Catalog Filtering by Skill Level
description: Verify that filtering courses by skill level returns accurate courses

steps.description: Navigate to courses page
Apply filter for beginner level courses
Verify only beginner level courses are listed
Apply filter for intermediate and advanced courses
Verify listing updates to show appropriate courses

title: Course Search by Title
description: Verify searching for courses by course title returns relevant results

steps.description: Navigate to courses page
Enter partial or full course title in search box
Execute search
Verify search results contain courses matching or containing the title query

title: Assessment Navigation and Quiz Progression
description: Verify the assessment quiz interface allows navigation through questions properly and does not allow skipping beyond question limits

steps.description: Start an assessment for any skill domain
Verify question 1 is displayed initially
Navigate through questions sequentially by answering or moving forward
Verify that user cannot move to next question without answering the current question
Attempt to go beyond question 15
Verify there is no next question after question 15

title: Landing Page UI and Navigation Elements
description: Verify the home page contains all navigational elements, hero section with engaging design and glassmorphism styling adheres to UI guidelines

steps.description: Navigate to home page
Verify presence of navigation links to Login, Register, Courses, and Assessment pages
Verify the hero section is visible with expected text and backgrounds including glassmorphism effect
Verify UI uses the specified orange accent colors consistently
Resize the browser window to various dimensions
Verify the layout is responsive and usable on all tested screen sizes

title: Responsive UI on Dashboard and Courses Pages
description: Verify responsiveness and visual consistency of dashboard and courses pages following design guidelines

steps.description: Login and navigate to dashboard
Verify dashboard's layout and elements adapt properly on different screen sizes
Navigate to courses page
Verify course catalog layout and filtering UI remain functional and accessible on various device sizes

title: Data Persistence in localStorage Verification
description: Verify key user data such as authentication session, assessment attempts and results, and course progress are properly stored and retrievable from localStorage

steps.description: Login with valid user
Check localStorage contains authentication data
Complete an assessment partially or fully
Verify assessment attempts and user_answers are updated in localStorage
Browse courses and enroll in at least one
Verify course_enrollments and lesson_progress data is saved in localStorage

title: Edge Case: Attempt Assessment Without Domain Selection
description: Verify that user cannot start an assessment without selecting a domain first

steps.description: Navigate to the assessment page after login
Attempt to proceed without selecting a skill domain
Verify appropriate validation message or disablement prevents starting assessment
